recent_updates.update_description: Allows tags to be saved when skipping, flagging, or exitting a task. Improved load times for admin tools.
Adds sound effects in Neuroglancer. Sped up admin tools. Added color palettes for Mesh colors.
Fixed issue with neuroglancer taskbar. Added Save State button. Added Y/N task type. Improved user experience and load times.
Adds multi-split mode under the path finding tool widget. Adds neuroglancer link sharing to synapse viewer.
Adds annotation color pallete preference. Updates to lineage viewer.
Adds zoom level and show slices to user preferences. Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Adds loading indicators to several pages and buttons. Adds CSV export for synapse information in synapse viewer.
Adds ability to remove a task from your queue. Adds new hotkey (p) to refresh all selected meshes.
Adds support for multiple root IDs in the synapse viewer. Removes NG Error logs. Adds hotkey to dismiss all NG messages (x). Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Adds ability to change point size in neuroglancer annotation side bar. Adds tags to inspect/tasks/admin pages. Adds priority patching on dashboard.
Adds individual switches for preference options. Add self-assignment feature.
Increased sidebar contrast. Retain source and target paths for path finding. Adds ability to customize annotation color in preferences. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
